addons.description: A list of addon service codes that should be booked for all reservations of this booking

adults.description: The number of adults per room

arrival_date.description: The arrival date of the guests

channel_code.description: The channel code for this reservation. You can find available channels in the codes for the hotel.

comment.description: The comment you want to add for this reservation

company.description: The company that will be linked to this reservation

company_id.description:
The id of a company profile. The id is build out of the Supplier Code a dash and the profile id
            shown in the hetras UI. An example id on the API for a profile with id 12345 on the level of supplier ABC 
            would be ABC-12345

contact.description: The contact that will be linked to this reservation

customer_id.description:
The id of a customer profile. The id is build out of the Supplier Code a dash and the profile id
            shown in the hetras UI. An example id on the API for a profile with id 12345 on the level of supplier ABC 
            would be ABC-12345

departure_date.description: The departure date of the guests

external_id.description:
The external id for this reservation. You can put here your own id used by you or the external system
            you integrate hetras with

group_code.description: The group code based on which the reservation will be created.

guarantee.description:
The guarantee for this reservation. See https://developer.hetras.com/docs/tutorials#payment for information about
            how to fill out the guarantee object

guarantee_type.description: One of the accepted guarantee types from the offer you selected out of the rates response

token.description: The token to be used for capturing the reservations amount or to guarantee for the reservation

authorization_expiry_date.description: The authorization expiry date you got back from the payment service provider

authorization_reference.description:
The authorization reference. This value is specific for different payment service providers. There will be
            a page on the developer portal explaining the pattern on how to fill this value for the payment service
            provider hetras is integrated with

authorization_status.description: The authorization status you got back from the payment service provider

merchant_reference.description: The merchant reference you used when requesting the token from the payment service provider

shopper_email.description: The shopper email you used when requesting the token from the payment service provider

shopper_reference.description:
The shopper reference you used when requesting the token from the payment service provider. It can
            be the same as the merchant reference

token_id.description: The token id you get from the payment service provider

guests.description: A list of guests with some basic guest details

consent_subscribe.description: The list of consents which the customer is subscribing

consent_unsubscribe.description: The list of consents which the customer is unsubscribing

customer_id.description:
The id of a customer profile. The id is build out of the Supplier Code a dash and the profile id
            shown in the hetras UI. An example id on the API for a profile with id 12345 on the level of supplier ABC 
            would be ABC-12345

email.description: The primary email address of the guest

mailing_address.description:
The home mailing address of the guest or if no home mailing address is specified it will
            give you the first address found on the guest profile.

address.description: The address details like street, number, and other in free format

address_type.description: One of the values from the enumeration of allowed address types

city.description: The city name for this address

country.description: The country code for this address in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format (see: http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes/iso_3166_code_lists/country_names_and_code_elements.htm)

postal_code.description: The postal code for this address

nationality.description:
The nationality of the guest in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format
            (see: http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes/iso_3166_code_lists/country_names_and_code_elements.htm)

phone.description: The primary phone number of the guest

primary.description: Defines if the guest is the primary guest of the reservation

title.description: Title of the guest. Needs to be taken from the available titles defined in the codes

hotel_id.description: The id of the hotel this reservation is valid for

payment_method.description: The payment method for this reservation

prepay_discount.description:
If you create a booking for a rateplan requiring prepayment this amount will be deducted from the booking value before
            the prepayment will be taken. This feature is useful when the booker redeems a gift voucher and you want to 
            only capture the remaining amount from the guestÂ´s credit card

rate_plan.description: The rate plan code this reservation is related to

room_type.description: The room type code this reservation is related to

rooms.description:
The number of rooms this reservation is for. After a multi-room booking is done there will be 
            one reservation in hetras for all rooms. The hotel staff then will split this reservation into
            one reservation per room to be able to check in the guests

travel_agent.description: The travel agency that will be linked to this reservation

company_id.description:
The id of a company profile. The id is build out of the Supplier Code a dash and the profile id
            shown in the hetras UI. An example id on the API for a profile with id 12345 on the level of supplier ABC 
            would be ABC-12345
